newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech HN-Wood index rises 11 points to 1,571 pts.
newsitem.headline: Czech HN-Wood index rises 11 points to 1,571 pts.

text.p: The HN-Wood index, measuring the 60 most capitalised issues on the Prague Stock Exchange, rose 11 points, or 0.71 percent, on Tuesday to 1,571, the brokerage house Wood & Company said.
